bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '精品榜',
    '人气榜',
    '推荐榜',
    '黑马榜',
    '新更新',
    '新漫画'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/rank/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
sort = [
    '冒险','热血','都市','玄幻','悬疑','耽美','恋爱','生活',
    '搞笑','穿越','修真','后宫','女主','古风','连载','完结'
];
for (i in sort) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/sort/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(sort[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (sort.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (sort.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 EdgA/127.0.0.0",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

eval(String(source.loginUrl));

    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var body = 'k=' + java.encodeURI(e);
    return Get('url') + '/s,{"body":"' + body + '","method":"POST"}';
}(key));
